definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: So I want him to have a good VCR to use.
sentences.chinese: 所以我希望他有一臺好的錄放機。

sentences.english: Information section of each audio playback time equal to the total time divided by 600.
sentences.chinese: 每個信息段的錄放音時間等於總時間除以600。

sentences.english: The remote screen has some basic controls for media playback.
sentences.chinese: 遙控屏幕有一些對媒體錄放的基本控制。

sentences.english: And does your son have a VCR now?
sentences.chinese: 所以我希望他有一臺好的錄放機。
